topics.body:
Do you ever get the feeling that a decade from now everyone's going to look back on 2000-2020 and go, "people used to act embarassing when they first joined the internet".

Like everyone when they first get internet connection whether they be 12 year olds trying to act internet "cool" or 50 year olds have this point where they act embarassing that they eventually grow out of.

I wouldn't be surprised if say in fifteen years anime music videos, dramawhores, sjw, "le funny tr0llz0rz"(not the legitimately funny kind, but the fifteen year olds trying to be internet "cool" kind and have usernames like "xXxsmokesweedseverdayxXx") and other embarassing things will be gone simply because by then the majority of people that use the internet will have grown out of that phase in much the same way most people grow out of their dorky teenage years. . . eventually.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
I've watched the first four episodes of Kabuto scrubbed.

I can see why someone would hate it. (Looking at you Squiggy)

But I'm Loving it so far.

Even though Tendou isn't a very realistic character, I still like him.

Also, I believe that Kagami is the real main character. (Tendou is Mostly a thing that drives the plot foward)

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5477f24e6368722295020200#post_5477f24e6368722295020200
I personally agree with the people who say That It's intentional, His Godlike qualities are played up so much that I can't possibly see it being unintentional. Which is why I say that He looks like "A thing that drives the plot foward". (I.E: They were never trying to make a Down to earth character with Tendou)

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5477f28863687225c48b0200#post_5477f28863687225c48b0200
Of course there will always be assholes; rather what I mean by this is that by 2020 the vast majority of the earth's population is projected to have some form of internet access so a couple years later the majority of those people will grow out of it eventually.  So by 2030 the overwhelming vast majority of people on the earth will have gotten over the whole, "I can post things anonymously on the internet and nobody will find out" phase; sure there will always be new little kids that are allowed access to the internet without any sort of parental supervision and as a result you're always going to see the people with the "xXx420stonerxXx" usernames, but at a lesser number because eventually the vast majority of people will have grown out of that phase.
